altTitles.ja: THE LIVE〜未来からの日記〜

description.en:
Only I can see the future in this deadly game. Yoon-Jae leads an empty life after his wife and daughter are brutally murdered. One day, his journal reveals one mysterious sentence: “You can see them again.” Yoon-Jae is pulled into a parallel universe where everyone is a player in a lethal game, and the final survivor will be granted any wish. Desperate to be reunited with his family, will Yoon-Jae succeed in fighting his way in this hellish world to be the last one standing? 

---

description.ja:
主人公は連続殺人犯に妻と娘を殺害される。 毎日絶望的な日々を送りながら日記をつけていたが、ある日突然、未来の自分が書いた日記に書き換わり、そこには妻と娘にもう一度会えると書かれていた。 そして仮想世界に引き込まれた主人公は、愛する家族と再会できる日を願いながら必死にチュートリアルをクリアしていく。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%94-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EB%B8%8C/2528)

description.ko:
불의의 사건으로 아내와 딸을 잃은 가장 윤재는 하루하루 절망에 빠져 살던 중, 미래의 자신이 보낸 일기장을 읽게 된다.

“아내와 딸을… 다시 만날 수 있다고?”

'이면 세계'의 '게임'을 이겨내는 자에게 주어지는 '성배', 그것을 사용하면 잃어버렸던 가족과 재회할 수 있다고 하는데…
강자만이 살아남는 잔혹한 세계에서 단 한 명, 미래를 아는 자가 된 윤재. 그는 그토록 바라던 소원을 이룰 수 있을까?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%94-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EB%B8%8C/2528)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28639)
description.ru:
Юн Чжэ потерял свою жену и дочь в результате несчастного случая. Лишившись смысла жизни, он прожигает её напрасно. Единственным, что осталось в память о покойной супруги, был дневник, который, может и пригодиться в будущем. Есть ли вероятность того, что… Ему удастся встретиться со своей семьёй ещё раз?  
  
"Святой грааль" - главная награда игрока, который смог пройти "игру" и занять первое место. Если Юн Чжэ сумеет заполучить его, то его семья снова будет с ним. Однако, в жестоком мире, где правит лишь сила, главному герою придётся преодолеть не мало препятствий, чтобы достичь желаемого. Сможет ли Юн Чжэ стать сильнейшим игроком?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%94-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EB%B8%8C/2528)

altTitles.th: ฮารุของฮานะ

description.en: A werewolf love for a human girl In a cold winter, little girl Hana and her family found a boy covered in blood, the boy is a werewolf baby. They picked up the boy, named him Haru, treated him and accepted him as a family member. A human girl and a werewolf boy who grew up over time. From now on their story begins.
description.tr: Soğuk bir kış mevsiminde küçük kız Hana ve ailesi, kanlar içinde bir çocuk bulurlar, bu çocuk yavru bir kurt adamdır. Haru adını verdikleri çocuğu yanlarına alıp tedavi ederler ve onu aileden biri olarak kabul ederler. Zamanla insan kız ve kurt adam çocuk büyürler, ve hikâyeleri de bu noktadan sonra başlar.

description.en: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

description.en: Heesu's world revolves around Chanyoung, his best friend and secret crush. He doesn't mind cheering Chanyoung from the sidelines or listening to all his girl problems. He doesn't care if people only know him as "Chanyoung's friend." Then one day, Heesu starts hearing his name everywhere. On the bus, in the halls, during lunch… Turns out, there's a rumor going around school (Got a love problem? Find Heesu in Class 2 and he'll tell you what to do!) and with that, Heesu suddenly finds himself the center of attention. But how could he give anyone advice? He doesn't even know what to do about his own crush!

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

description.de:
Als die sechsjährige Inés zum ersten Mal den gut aussehenden Erben von Haus Escalante erblickt, macht sie den Jungen direkt zu ihrem Verlobten. Da alle adeligen Männer bekanntlich gleich sind, dachte sie, sie könnte auch gleich einen gut aussehenden wählen. Aber der kleine Lord Cárcel ist noch nicht bereit für diese Art von Verpflichtung und verbringt die nächsten 15 Jahre damit, die Heirat um jeden Preis zu vermeiden. Glücklicherweise ist das kein Problem für Inés, da das Scheitern ihrer Ehe genau das ist, was sie will. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.

---
Note: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.

description.en:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...

---

description.id:
Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Omong kosong macam apa itu? Dia bahkan memperbolehkanku untuk berkencan dengan wanita mana pun? Dia adalah seorang Duchess Escallante yang tidak tinggal bersama dengan Duke Escallante. Dia tidak butuh pria yang baik hati, melainkan pria yang suatu saat bisa disingkirkan dari kehidupannya secara hukum. Tapi sayang sekali, aku, Duke Escallante, tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi. Aku tidak tertarik dengan kebebasan yang kau tawarkan. "Aku memang seorang bajing*n, tapi aku lebih setia daripada yang kamu bayangkan, Ines Valeztena."

Inés non aveva bisogno di un marito normale, ma di un uomo che un giorno sarebbe stato legalmente rimosso dalla sua vita . Sfortunatamente , avere un playboy come fidanzato non è per niente una cosa bella. È così che Cárcel é stato etichettato. Ma ad un certo punto decide di cambiare e dimostrare che può essere il marito perfetto!

description.uk:
Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!
На щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.
Та, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.

description.pt-br:
“Me casei com o maior gostosão da sociedade para então me divorciar e finalmente poder ser livre.”

Quando Inês de 6 anos colocou seus olhos no lindo herdeiro da Casa Escalante, ela logo o fez seu noivo. Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.

---

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

description.en:
Zhou Gongjin, who was the mastermind of what happened in the Parasite Doll incident of Nine Schools Competition, has fled from Yokohama to the area of the original ancient magic users group centred around Kyoto also known as the *traditionalists*.   
Since then two months have passed and the National High School Magic Thesis Competition will soon be held again. This year's Thesis Competition is being held in Kyoto sponsored by the Magic Association and in their conference hall.   
Tatsuya gets visited by the Kuroba twins who as representatives bring Yotsuba Maya's letter to him. The letter is a request from his aunt saying "I hope for your cooperation to capture Zhou Gongjin".  
While it is questionable that whether it is a "command" rather than a "request", Tatsuya and Miyuki go to Kudou's house as they are in the centre as opponents of the traditionalists. As a result, the two siblings have a fated encounter with the "Genius Augmented Magician”.   
Conspiracy of the ancient city was the stage. The fate that has continued to smoulder away in the back of the history of magician development, Tatsuya and Miyuki and his companions are challenged.   
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 14-15.

It was a weapon that was on par with the legendary sword the Hero wielded. The first volume of an adventure fantasy of the youth with a realistic growth!

The artist Mao retired at chapter 20 and was replaced by Kuuma Arai at chapter 21.
description.id:
Yukina adalah seorang pria muda yang berasal dari sebuah desa di mana sang pahlawan yang memikul beban dunia juga berasal.  
Karena suatu insiden, dia mendapatkan sebuah tombak yang dapat berbicara bernama Gram. Dan itu adalah senjata yang setara dengan pedang legendaris yang dimiliki oleh sang Pahlawan.  
Kisah fantasi petualangan para pemuda dengan pertumbuhan yang realistis dimulai!

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 落郷文士伝

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

description.en:
Upon a kingdom ravaged by war, descended a Dragon promising triumph and life eternal - a proposal accepted, a proposal respected, but one that would come at a severe price for the inhabitants.

Now the kingdom is in ruins. How come? It's for amnesiacs 'Missy' and Jess to find out.

______________

Devious Miss Crimson is a short story by RedbowCR (Crimson Ribbon: Summer Rain) aiming to provide a concise but complete narrative for the reader.

My second ever manga made as I gear up to tackle my next projects, I hope you will enjoy what this fun little story can provide to you, let's look forward to the future.

More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr

title.en: The Public Moral Committee Member and the Delinquent Who Will Be Together in the Future

altTitles.ru: Член Комитета общественной морали и правонарушитель, которые будут вместе в будущем

altTitles.ja: 将来付き合うことになる風紀委員と不良生徒

altTitles.ja-ro: Shourai Tsukiau Koto ni Naru Fuuki-iin to Furyou Seito

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation Record of a Misanthrope

altTitles.ja: ぼっち転生記

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

Some parents give their kids an inheritance. Some give their kids a car. Jinwon's parents gave him… a motel. And not even a great one. Rundown and in need of massive repairs, the Ballantine Motel used to be a golden goose. But, of course, a drunk driver running his car through the entrance tends to change things.  
  
So when Jinwon takes over, he makes some upgrades and additions. And while "Ballantine" is a nice name, it's a bit long. So, of course, he makes the obvious choice and shortens it. The BL Motel is the neighborhood's newest addition. Of course, now all Jinwon needs is some new help and maybe find out why so many gay couples have started visiting. Then again, when life give you lemons, you lean in and stock the vending machines with lube.

title.en: Watashi no Hatsukoi wa Hazukashisugite Darenimo Ienai

altTitles.ja: 私の初恋は恥ずかしすぎて誰にも言えない

altTitles.en: My First Love Is Too Embarrassing to Tell Anyone

description.en:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

description.en: Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

title.en: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - The Final

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン　ＴＨＥ　ＦＩＮＡＬ

description.en:
Rising Sun - The Final is the 9th arc in the Captain Tsubasa series, covering the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain.

The arc lasting 10 chapters from April 2023 to April 2024 ended serialization half-way through the match when the mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, thus ending the official published serialization but continuing the story at his own pace, on the official Captain Tsubasa World website has a web-comic under the title Captain Tsubasa: Rising Sun - Finals.

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?

altTitles.en: The Mountain Branches Dream of Goblins

description.fr:
Min-chan, doit vivre sa vie en chassant des fantômes à cause de la malédiction dont il souffre depuis l'enfance. Un jour, il se voit proposer un "gros coup" par un homme puissant en qui lui a autant confiance qu'en sa famille. S'il parvient à se débarrasser de "lui" il pourra mener une vie normale ! Après être arrivé à l'endroit où "il" se trouve, Min-chan rencontre un homme qui l'appelle "Kim Seo-ho".

"Tu es enfin de retour, Kim Seo-ho... !!! Je vais faire en sorte que tu ne puisses plus t'enfuir. Parce que je me souviens de chaque odeur qui te concerne."

Min-chan sera-t-il capable de chasser cet homme en toute sécurité ?"

altTitles.ja: Kaette Kudasai! Akutsu-san
ヤンキー娘

altTitles.ja-ro: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

description.en:
A wolf pup separated from his parents before his name was even given gets saved by Heedo, a hare who was passing by. 
"Can't you give me a name, Hyung...?"
As the clear and bright eyes of the wolf pup plead with him, Heedo names the pup Wooyeon.
And with that, Wooyeon and Heedo grow up in each others' company.
On the day Wooyeon successfully takes on his human form for the first time upon becoming an adult, a strangely dangerous look flashes from his eyes...
What will happen between Heedo the hare and his natural enemy Wooyeon the wolf?

altTitles.ja: おっちょこドジおねえさん

description.en:

description.en: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?

description.en: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

description.en: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?

description.en:
I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
description.fr: "Je pensais que c'était juste platonique, passer le reste de notre vie ensemble comme de simples amis..." C'était jusqu'à ce que Han Jei annonce la nouvelle : "Seo Jin, je vais me marier." Seo Jin, qui a été adopté en Allemagne lorsqu'il était enfant, entretient une relation de 15 ans avec Jei. Lorsqu'il est confronté à la perspective du mariage de Jei, il se rend compte qu'il est amoureux de lui. Travaillant comme pilote, Seo Jin retourne en Corée pour tenter de s'enfuir, mais son plan commence à s'effondrer lorsque Jei monte à bord du vol pour le suivre. Les deux se retrouvent à vivre ensemble en Corée alors que la date du mariage de Jei approche à grands pas. "Seo Jin, tu n'agis pas comme ça à cause de moi, n'est-ce pas ?" Alors que Seo Jin essaie de repousser Jei en raison de ses désirs émergents et que Jei souhaite raviver leur précieuse amitié, ils passent plus de temps ensemble et la tension entre eux commence à surgir...
description.ko: 우정이라고 생각했다. 가장 가까운 곳에서 평생을 함께할, ...그냥 친구. "서진아, 나 결혼해." 한재이가 청천벽력 같은 소식을 전하기 전까지는. 어린 시절 독일로 입양되어 재이와 15년간 우정을 지켜온 서진. 그의 결혼이라는 현실과 맞닥뜨리고서야 재이에 대한 감정이 사랑이었음을 깨닫게 된다. 항공사 기장으로 근무하던 서진은 도망치듯 한국으로 이직하지만 재이가 서진을 따라 한국행 비행기에 오르며 계획은 점점 더 어긋나게 된다. 재이의 결혼을 앞둔 채 한국에서 아슬한 동거를 시작하게 된 두 사람. "서진아, 혹시 나 때문에 그러는 건 아니지?" 자꾸만 피어나는 욕심에 그를 밀어내려는 서진과 소중한 친구를 되찾고 싶은 재이, 함께하는 시간이 길어질수록 두 사람 사이에는 미묘한 분위기가 흐르는데…

description.fr:
Ce webtoon contient des scènes de violence graphique, des meurtres d'animaux et d'autres éléments perturbants.

Calahan est un célèbre chasseur de prime qui a capturé 999 criminels recherchés.
Il choisit l'escroc Johnny Downs comme dernière cible pour la récompense de 10 millions de pièces et sa retraite.
Mais Johnny, qui est accusé d'avoir fait les poches de personnes âgées, clame son innocence.

"Si je vous prouve mon innocence, donnez-moi un million de pièces".

Calahan et Johnny se lancent dans une course effrénée avec un million de pièces à la clé,
avec un groupe d'hommes suspects à leurs trousses...

À dix jours du bureau du shérif, qui gagnera le pari ?

altTitles.ja: 灼熱カバディ

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!
